description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.
name: newsdata.news

improvement: The current tool name and description may not be as compelling as they could be to users. The tool name should reflect its capabilities more accurately, while the description should highlight its benefits over other tools.
description:
Get the latest news headlines from around the world, tailored to your interests. Our endpoint retrieves breaking news for a country, specific category within a country, or multiple domains, with articles sorted by publication date.

With our tool, you can build experience like showcasing the latest news, creating breaking news tickers, and analyzing News to better understand their content.
name: newsdata.latest_headlines

improvement: The current tool name and description may not be as compelling as they could be to users. The tool name should reflect its capabilities more accurately, while the description should highlight its benefits over other tools.

description:
Get real-time access to global news headlines, tailored to your interests. Our endpoint retrieves data for specific countries, categories within those countries, or multiple domains.

With our tool, you can build experience like showcasing the latest news and creating breaking news tickers. It also facilitates analysis of news content to gain a deeper understanding of its characteristics.
name: newsdata.realtime_news

improvement: The tool names and descriptions may not be as effective as they could be to users. The tool name should reflect its capabilities more accurately, while the description should highlight its benefits over other tools.
description:
Get breaking news from around the world, tailored to your interests. Our endpoint retrieves real-time headlines for a country, specific category within a country, or multiple domains.

With our tool, you can quickly find the latest news and get insights into global events. It also enables you to analyze news content to gain a deeper understanding of its characteristics.
